DataElement.preferredName: Human Immunodeficiency Virus Most Recent Test Interval
DataElement.preferredDefinition: a period of time separating the calendar date in the present and another occurrence nearest before the present for a procedure to determine the presence of human immunodeficiency virus, a species of lentivirus, acknowledged to be the agent responsible for the acute infectious manifestations and immunologic abnormalities linked to the Acquired Immunodeficiency Syndrome.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Human Immunodeficiency Virus Most Recent Test
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Human immunodeficiency virus. Species of LENTIVIRUS, subgenus primate lentiviruses (LENTIVIRUSES, PRIMATE), formerly designated T-cell lymphotropic virus type III/lymphadenopathy-associated virus (HTLV-III/LAV). It is acknowledged to be the agent responsible for the acute infectious manifestations, neurologic disorders, and immunologic abnormalities linked to the ACQUIRED IMMUNODEFICIENCY SYNDROME._Greatest in amount, extent, or degree._Near to or not long before the present._A procedure for critical evaluation; a means of determining the presence, quality, or truth of something._a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen._A procedure for critical evaluation; a means of determining the presence, quality, or truth of something.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Human immunodeficiency virus. Species of LENTIVIRUS, subgenus primate lentiviruses (LENTIVIRUSES, PRIMATE), formerly designated T-cell lymphotropic virus type III/lymphadenopathy-associated virus (HTLV-III/LAV). It is acknowledged to be the agent responsible for the acute infectious manifestations, neurologic disorders, and immunologic abnormalities linked to the ACQUIRED IMMUNODEFICIENCY SYNDROME.

Concepts.definition: The virus isolated and recognized as the etiologic agent of AIDS. HIV-1 is classified as a lentivirus, a subtype of retroviruses.

Property.preferredDefinition: Greatest in amount, extent, or degree; constituting a majority.:Near to or not long before the present.:A procedure for critical evaluation; a means of determining the presence, quality, or truth of something.

Concepts.definition: Greatest in amount, extent, or degree; constituting a majority.
Near to or not long before the present.
A procedure for critical evaluation; a means of determining the presence, quality, or truth of something.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from caBIG to PhenX for PANH by script 2015-12-21

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The period of time separating two instances or occurrences of a procedure to determining the presence of a protein made by plasma cells (a type of white blood cell) in response to an antigen (a substance that causes the body to make a specific immune response).

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest exceeds another object in quantity or measure or value or status.: The time period one year before the current time.

Concepts.definition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest exceeds another object in quantity or measure or value or status.
The time period one year before the current time.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Less Than or Equal To One Year Ago

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Less Than or Equal To One Year Ago
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest is smaller than the other object in one of these ways.: The time period one year before the current time.

Concepts.definition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest is smaller than the other object in one of these ways.
The time period one year before the current time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A procedure for critical evaluation; a means of determining the presence, quality, or truth of something.:The period of time or the distance separating two instances, events, or occurrences.

Concepts.definition: A procedure for critical evaluation; a means of determining the presence, quality, or truth of something.
The period of time or the distance separating two instances, events, or occurrences.
